name: Das Aviation School
about: DAS Aviation School, located at Entebbe International Airport in Uganda, is a renowned training organization certified by IATA. We specialize in providing comprehensive aviation training, focusing on both flight operations and air traffic management. Our programs are designed to equip students with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel in the aviation industry. The school offers practical and hands-on training, ensuring that graduates are competent, qualified, and well-prepared for their careers. With a strong emphasis on safety and efficiency, DAS Aviation School is committed to investing in the education and development of its students, leading to positive outcomes in the field of Air Traffic Management. Our dedicated team and state-of-the-art facilities make us a trusted choice for those seeking a career in aviation.
services:
